channel.title: [508] Summoning monsters in interface are null?
channel.description:
Okay well in the summoning tab, when you summon a monster this is what comes up as the face:
[img]http://i207.photobucket.com/albums/bb65/skittle385/summ.jpg[/img]
How can i make it so that it's the NPC's face?
